root.name: StarDrone
root.description: Overview StarDrone is based on the hit Flash game also by the same name, much like Super Meat Boy. It is one of the early adopters of the Move Controller as well as utilizing stereoscopic 3D. The game consists of fast action top-down shooting, collecting gems and using powerups using competitive score-boarding and timers as the main push to the game. The idea is that the players pilot Drones through the galaxy to collect parts of 'Equilibrix' that is supposedly meant to stabilize the universe and prevent the expansions of 'G-Noids'. The PS3 version will have a future update that will add stereoscopic 3D.HistoryStarDrone was first seen on the Orb Games limited flash portal www.tastyplay.com, then moved to Big Fish Games.
